name: Filling a Water Bottle
description:
This is a simulation game.

Your job is to fill the bottle/cup with water as soon as possible. Try not to miss too much water because it's not eco-friendly😁. Your total time of filling the water will be calculated.

If you cannot successfully add one drop of water in 10 secs, you'll lose the game.

Control for pc is "x" to drop and "c" to open next level.

There are multiple levels and the difficulty will increase.
